column5: Seems you can go a lot bigger than I ever did when I fished them green things.
Their favorites are kittens. Make sure they are declawed.
Do I need a heavy casting rod to chuck a duck, or would my med-heavy do the job?? You expert opinions are invited!!
Nope, I've see lots of guys using fly rods when chuck and duck fishing fer sammins!!!!
Nope, I've see lots of guys using fly rods when chuck and duck fishing fer sammins!!!!  Don't need no steenking  fly rod!1 All you need is a long handle net for those saLmonS when they are spawning!
